post.description:
This endpoint can only be accessed by users with the "Learner" role.
The request should be sent as `multipart/form-data` to allow file uploads.

400.description: If validation fails or the data is invalid.

put.summary: Updates an existing teacher application (only if it is still Pending or Rejected).
put.description:
This endpoint allows resubmission of an application when the previous one was rejected or pending.
Certificates and profile information will be revalidated and updated accordingly.

get.summary: Retrieves a paginated list of courses, optionally filtered by course status.

parameters.name: status
parameters.description:
Optional filter by course status. Accepted values:
<list type="bullet"><item><description>`Draft`</description></item><item><description>`PendingApproval`</description></item><item><description>`Published`</description></item><item><description>`Rejected`</description></item><item><description>`Archived`</description></item></list>

200.description: Successfully retrieved the list of courses.

post.summary: Creates a new course submitted by an authorized teacher.
post.description:
This endpoint is restricted to users with the `Teacher` role.
The method extracts the teacher's ID from the authentication token, validates the request,
and delegates course creation to M:BLL.Services.Course.CourseService.CreateCourseAsync(System.Guid,Common.DTO.Course.Request.CourseRequest).

get.summary: Retrieves the details of a course by its ID.

parameters.name: courseId
parameters.description: The ID of the course

500.description: Server error during course details retrieval

put.summary: Update a course (only Draft or Rejected courses can be updated).
put.description:
- Only the teacher who created the course can update it.  
- Status will remain Draft after update until submitted for review.  
- If a new image is uploaded, the old one will be deleted from Cloudinary.

parameters.name: courseId
parameters.description: ID of the course to update

get.summary: Retrieves all courses created by the currently authenticated teacher.

parameters.name: status
parameters.description:
(Optional) Filter courses by status.  
Accepted values: Draft, PendingApproval, Published, Rejected, Archived.

400.description: If the status value is invalid or user ID format is incorrect.

401.description: If the user is not authenticated or not a Teacher.

404.description: If no teacher or courses found.
